obtain.pool.twotoken: Deposit {{token1}} and {{token2}} at a 50-50 rate in {{protocol}}'s PFLINK<{{token1}}/{{token2}}><{{{link}}}> pool.
obtain.pool.multitoken: Deposit any of {{tokens}} into {{protocol}}'s PFLINK<{{poolName}}><{{{link}}}> pool.
obtain.pool.multitoken.all: Deposit all of {{tokens}} into {{protocol}}'s PFLINK<{{poolName}}><{{{link}}}> pool.
obtain.pool.uni3: Deposit {{token1}} and {{token2}} into the pickle jar directly.
risk.maintain.peg: {{token}} may fail to maintain it's peg to {{target}}.
risk.divergence.loss: Divergence / Impermanent Loss: large swings in token prices may cause this strategy to underperform holding the underlying tokens.
asset.description.standard.lp: A {{protocol}} strategy for PFLINK<{{{tokens}}}><{{{poolUrl}}}>, a liquidity pool composed of {{{tokens}}} tokens. The deposit token is staked in {{{stakeLocation}}} for {{{rewards}}} rewards. All rewards are sold to purchase more LP tokens.
asset.description.univ3.lp: A Uniswap-V3 strategy for PFLINK<{{{tokens}}}><{{{poolUrl}}}>, a Uniswap-v3 style liquidity pool composed of {{{tokens}}} tokens. Using concentrated ranges, this style of strategies can capture more LP trading fees than other types of liquidity pools.
asset.description.univ3.rewards.lp: A Uniswap-V3 strategy for PFLINK<{{{tokens}}}><{{{poolUrl}}}>, a Uniswap-v3 style liquidity pool composed of {{{tokens}}} tokens. Using concentrated ranges, this style of strategies can capture more LP trading fees than other types of liquidity pools. The deposit token is staked in {{{stakeLocation}}} for {{{rewards}}} rewards. All rewards are sold to purchase more LP tokens.
asset.description.balancer.rewards.lp: A {{protocol}} strategy for PFLINK<{{{tokens}}}><{{{poolUrl}}}>, a Balancer-style liquidity pool composed of {{{tokens}}} tokens. The deposit token is staked in {{{stakeLocation}}} for {{{rewards}}} rewards. All rewards are sold to purchase more LP tokens.
asset.description.curve.rewards.lp: A {{protocol}} strategy for PFLINK<{{{tokens}}}><{{{poolUrl}}}>, a Curve-style liquidity pool composed of {{{tokens}}} tokens. The deposit token is staked in {{{stakeLocation}}} for {{{rewards}}} rewards. All rewards are sold to purchase more LP tokens.
sCRV.desc: A Curve strategy for PFLINK<sUSDv2 pool><https://www.curve.fi/susdv2/deposit> sUSDv2 pool employs a basket of 4 stablecoins to peg to US$1 and the switching between them to be stable at $1, learn more about PFLINK<sUSD><https://docs.synthetix.io/litepaper>. CRV reward is reinvested for more LP.
renBTCCRV.desc: A Curve strategy for PFLINK<renBTC pool><https://www.curve.fi/ren/deposit> renBTC pool employs a basket of renBTC and WBTC to peg to 1BTC. Learn more about PFLINK<renVM><https://github.com/renproject/ren/wiki#tldr> and PFLINK<WBTC><https://wbtc.network>. CRV reward is reinvested for more LP.
3poolCRV.desc: A Curve strategy for PFLINK<3poolCRV pool><https://www.curve.fi/3pool/deposit> 3poolCRV pool employs the 3 most popular stablecoins to peg to US$1 and the switching between them to be stable at $1, learn more about PFLINK<DAI><https://makerdao.com/en/>, PFLINK<USDC><https://www.circle.com/en/usdc>, and PFLINK<USDT><https://tether.to>. CRV reward is reinvested for more LP.
steCRV.desc: A Convex strategy for PFLINK<stETH pool><https://www.curve.fi/steth/deposit> stETH pool aims to peg the staked ETH in LIDO to 1 ETH and making stETH liquid. Learn more about PFLINK<LIDO><https://www.lido.fi>. CVX, LIDO and CRV reward is reinvested for more LP.
ALETH.desc: A Saddle strategy for PFLINK<alETH pool><https://saddle.exchange/#/pools/aleth/deposit> alETH pool aims to peg alETH from Alchemix to peg to 1 ETH and making alETH liquid. Learn more about alETH>. This symbiotic jar reinvests the ALCX reward and stake it in the ALCX single pool.
LQTY.desc: A Liquity strategy for LQTY staking. LQTY is a token that captures the fee revenue generated by the Liquity Protocol via staking. You can read more about LQTY and Liquity PFLINK<here><https://docs.liquity.org>.
MIR-UST.desc: A Uniswap V2 strategy for PFLINK<UST/MIR><https://app.uniswap.org/#/add/v2/0x09a3ecafa817268f77be1283176b946c4ff2e608/0xa47c8bf37f92aBed4A126BDA807A7b7498661acD> an Uniswap V2 of UST/MIR. UST is the stablecoin in PFLINK<Terra network><https://terra.money/#1> while PFLINK<MIR><https://docs.mirror.finance/protocol/mirror-token-mir> is the governance token of Mirror protocol.> MIR reward is reinvested for more LP.
MTSLA-UST.desc: A Mirrored TSLA (mAsset> strategy for PFLINK<UST/MTSLA><https://app.uniswap.org/#/add/v2/0x21cA39943E91d704678F5D00b6616650F066fD63/0xa47c8bf37f92aBed4A126BDA807A7b7498661acD> an Uniswap V2 LP of UST:MTSLA>. MTSLA is a mirrored PFLINK<Tesla Inc. Common Stock><https://www.nasdaq.com/market-activity/stocks/tsla>, using decentralized oracles from Band protocol, which updates every 15 seconds on the Band chain. Read more PFLINK<here><https://medium.com/mirror-protocol/mirror-protocol-partners-with-band-protocol-to-secure-issuance-of-synthetic-stocks-and-etfs-1a12181b6cdc>. MIR reward is reinvested for more LP.
MAAPL-UST.desc: A Mirrored APPL (mAsset> strategy for PFLINK<UST/MAAPL><https://app.uniswap.org/#/add/v2/0xd36932143F6eBDEDD872D5Fb0651f4B72Fd15a84/0xa47c8bf37f92aBed4A126BDA807A7b7498661acD> an Uniswap V2 LP of UST:MAAPL>. MAAPL is a mirrored PFLINK<Apple Inc. Common Stock><https://www.nasdaq.com/market-activity/stocks/aapl>. MIR reward is reinvested for more LP.
MQQQ-UST.desc: A Mirrored QQQ (mAsset> strategy for PFLINK<UST/MQQQ><https://app.uniswap.org/#/add/v2/0x13B02c8dE71680e71F0820c996E4bE43c2F57d15/0xa47c8bf37f92aBed4A126BDA807A7b7498661acD> an Uniswap V2 LP of UST:MQQQ>. MQQQ is a mirrored PFLINK<Invesco QQQ Trust><https://www.nasdaq.com/market-activity/funds-and-etfs/qqq>. MIR reward is reinvested for more LP.
MSLV-UST.desc: A Mirrored SLV (mAsset> strategy for PFLINK<UST/MSLV><https://app.uniswap.org/#/add/v2/0x9d1555d8cB3C846Bb4f7D5B1B1080872c3166676/0xa47c8bf37f92aBed4A126BDA807A7b7498661acD> an Uniswap V2 LP of UST:MSLV> MSLV is a mirrored PFLINK<iShare Silver Trust><https://www.nasdaq.com/market-activity/funds-and-etfs/slv>. MIR reward is reinvested for more LP.
MBABA-UST.desc: A Mirrored BABA (mAsset> strategy for PFLINK<UST/MBABA><https://app.uniswap.org/#/add/v2/0x56aA298a19C93c6801FDde870fA63EF75Cc0aF72/0xa47c8bf37f92aBed4A126BDA807A7b7498661acD> an Uniswap V2 LP of UST:MBABA> MBABA is a mirrored PFLINK<Alibaba Group Holding Limited><https://www.nasdaq.com/market-activity/stocks/baba>. MIR reward is reinvested for more LP.
MIM3CRV.desc: A Convex strategy for PFLINK<MIM3CRV><https://curve.fi/mim> MIM3CRV pool employs a basket of 4 stablecoins to peg to US$1 and the switching between them to be stable at $1, learn more about PFLINK<MIM><https://docs.abracadabra.money>. CRV, CVX and SPELL reward is reinvested for more MIM3CRV.
FEI-TRIBE.desc: An Uniswap V2 strategy for PFLINK<FEI/TRIBE><https://app.uniswap.org/#/add/v2/0x956f47f50a910163d8bf957cf5846d573e7f87ca/0xc7283b66eb1eb5fb86327f08e1b5816b0720212b> "FEI is a highly scalable, decentralized, and reserve-backed stablecoin." Read more about FEI PFLINK<here><https://medium.com/fei-protocol/what-you-should-know-about-fei-3ccffd4a4bb6>. TRIBE is the governance token that manages the protocol>. TRIBE reward is reinvested for more LP.
ALCX-ETH.desc: A Sushiswap strategy for PFLINK<ETH/ALCX><https://app.sushi.com/add/0xc02aaa39b223fe8d0a0e5c4f27ead9083c756cc2/0xdbdb4d16eda451d0503b854cf79d55697f90c8df>. ALCX is the governance token for Alchemix Finance. Taken from their website "Alchemix Finance is a future-yield-backed synthetic asset platform and community DAO. The platform gives you advances on your yield farming via a synthetic token that represents a fungible claim on any underlying collateral in the Alchemix protocol." Read more about Alchemix PFLINK<here><https://alchemix-finance.gitbook.io/alchemix-finance/>. ALCX and SUSHI reward are reinvested for more LP.
yvBOOST-ETH.desc: A Sushiswap strategy for PFLINK<ETH/YVBOOST><https://app.sushi.com/add/ETH/0x9d409a0A012CFbA9B15F6D4B36Ac57A46966Ab9a>. yvBOOST is the upgraded version of yveCRV, which incorporate the weekly reward from veCRV automatically. SUSHI reward is reinvested for more LP. PFLINK<Here is a video showing how yvBOOST works.
USDC.desc: An affiliate strategy with Yearn for v2 USDC vault. Pickle deposits USDC into Yearn v2 USDC vault where strategies from Yearn will seek the highest yield in the market.
lusdCRV.desc: An affiliate strategy with Yearn for v2 LUSD vault. Pickle deposits LUSD into Yearn v2 LUSD vault where strategies from Yearn will seek the highest yield in the market.
FRAXCRV.desc: An affiliate strategy with Yearn for v2 FraxCRV vault. Frax is an fractional-algorithmic stablecoin. Read more about Frax PFLINK<here><https://docs.frax.finance>. Pickle deposits FraxCRV into Yearn v2 FraxCRV vault where strategies from Yearn will seek the highest yield in the market.
IBCRV.desc: An affiliate strategy with Yearn for v2 Iron Bank CRV vault. Read more about Iron Bank PFLINK<here><https://creamdotfinance.medium.com/introducing-the-iron-bank-bab9417c9a>. Pickle deposits ibCRV into Yearn v2 ibCRV vault where strategies from Yearn will seek the highest yield in the market.
DAI.desc: A folding DAI strategy in AAVE. DAI is folded until the maximum safe leverage is gained. MATIC reward is sold for more DAI.
am3CRV.desc: A Curve strategy for PFLINK<am3CRV><https://polygon.curve.fi/aave/deposit>. When you deposit DAI/USDC/USDT into the Curve pool, those stables are wrapped into AAVE interest bearing coins and then deposited inside the pool which means you receive AAVE lending interest as well as Matic rewards distributed on the AAVE protocol.
IS3USD.desc: A Curve strategy for PFLINK<IS3USD><https://app.iron.finance/swap/pools/is3usd/deposit> pool (IS3USD pool employs the 3 most popular stablecoins to peg to US$1 and the switching between them to be stable at $1, learn more about PFLINK<DAI><https://makerdao.com/en/>, PFLINK<USDC><https://www.circle.com/en/usdc>, and PFLINK<USDT><https://tether.to>. Read more about Iron Finance PFLINK<here><https://docs.iron.finance>. ICE reward is reinvested for more LP.
Mim2CRV.desc: A Curve strategy for PFLINK<MIM2CRV><https://arbitrum.curve.fi/factory/0/deposit> MIM2CRV pool employs a basket of 3 stablecoins to peg to US$1 and the switching between them to be stable at $1, learn more about PFLINK<MIM><https://docs.abracadabra.money>. SPELL reward is reinvested for more MIM2CRV.
LOOKS.desc: A LooksRare strategy for single-staking the PFLINK<looks><https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?inputCurrency=ETH&outputCurrency=0xf4d2888d29d722226fafa5d9b24f9164c092421e> token into a LooksRare reward contract. Stakers earn a share of the platform's ETH fees. This strategy sells the ETH to buy more LOOKS.
saddled4.desc: A Saddle strategy for earning yield on 4 dollar-coins (AlUSD, Fei, Frax, and LUSD). This strategy accepts the PFLINK<deposit token><https://saddle.exchange/#/pools/d4/deposit> and stakes it in the rewarder contract, which earns FXS, LQTY, ALCX, and Tribe rewards. All rewards are then sold off and used to buy more LP.
